column5: BYND no position here because I am not that crazy But I hope they do well It is way more fund to trade this stock when momentum is up But if you want a company that is established and undervalued in the plantbased meat alternative market you cant go wrong with K Kellogg owns Morningstar Farms which makes awesome veggie burgers and even buffalo chicken replica burgers which are amazing
K analysts on Estimize are expecting 1550 YoY EPS growth for Q2 down from 1513 in Q1 Reporting 0801 BMOestimizecomintrokchart
